014
015package de.softwareforge.testing.postgres.embedded;
016
017import static com.google.common.base.Preconditions.checkNotNull;
018import static com.google.common.base.Preconditions.checkState;
019import static java.lang.String.format;
020
021import java.io.File;
022import java.io.FilterInputStream;
023import java.io.IOException;
024import java.io.InputStream;
025import java.io.UncheckedIOException;
026import java.nio.charset.StandardCharsets;
027import java.util.Objects;
028import java.util.function.Supplier;
029import java.util.jar.JarEntry;
030import java.util.jar.JarFile;
031
032import com.google.common.base.Suppliers;
033import com.google.common.hash.HashCode;
034import com.google.common.hash.Hashing;
035import com.google.common.io.BaseEncoding;
036import org.slf4j.Logger;
037import org.slf4j.LoggerFactory;
038
039/**
040 * Resolves PostgreSQL archives from the Maven repository. Looks for the zonky.io artifacts located at
041 * <code>io.zonky.test.postgres:embedded-postgres-binaries-&lt;os&gt;-&lt;arch&gt;</code>.
042 * <p>
043 * See <a href="https://github.com/zonkyio/embedded-postgres-binaries">The Zonky IO github page</a> for more details.
044 */
045public final class ZonkyIOPostgresLocator implements NativeBinaryLocator {
046
047    private static final String ZONKY_GROUP_ID = "io.zonky.test.postgres";
048    private static final String ZONKY_ARTIFACT_ID_TEMPLATE = "embedded-postgres-binaries-%s-%s";
049
050    public static final Logger LOG = LoggerFactory.getLogger(ZonkyIOPostgresLocator.class);
051
052    private static final boolean PREFER_NATIVE = Boolean.getBoolean("pg-embedded.prefer-native");
053
054    private final String architecture;
055    private final String os;
056    private final String serverVersion;
057
058    private final MavenArtifactLoader artifactLoader = new MavenArtifactLoader();
059
060    private final Supplier<File> fileSupplier = Suppliers.memoize(this::loadArtifact);
061
062    ZonkyIOPostgresLocator(String serverVersion) {
063        this.serverVersion = checkNotNull(serverVersion, "serverVersion is null");
064
065        this.os = computeOS();
066        this.architecture = computeTarXzArchitectureName();
067        LOG.debug(format("Detected a %s %s system, using PostgreSQL version %s", architecture, os, serverVersion));
068    }
069
070    @Override
071    public InputStream getInputStream() throws IOException {
072        try {
073            File artifactFile = fileSupplier.get();
074            return createJarStream(artifactFile);
075        } catch (UncheckedIOException e) {
076            throw e.getCause();
077        }
078    }
079
080    @Override
081    public String getIdentifier() throws IOException {
082        // the optimized identifier computation saves ~ 1% CPU according to the profiler
083        try {
084            File artifactFile = fileSupplier.get();
085            HashCode hashCode = Hashing.murmur3_128().hashString(artifactFile.getAbsolutePath(), StandardCharsets.UTF_8);
086            return INSTALL_DIRECTORY_PREFIX + BaseEncoding.base16().encode(hashCode.asBytes());
087        } catch (UncheckedIOException e) {
088            throw e.getCause();
089        }
090    }
091
092    private File loadArtifact() {
093        try {
094            String artifactId = format(ZONKY_ARTIFACT_ID_TEMPLATE, this.os, computeJarArchitectureName());
095
096            // alpine hack
097            if (EmbeddedUtil.IS_ALPINE_LINUX) {
098                artifactId += "-alpine";
099            }
100
101            String version = artifactLoader.findLatestVersion(ZONKY_GROUP_ID, artifactId, serverVersion);
102            File file = artifactLoader.getArtifactFile(ZONKY_GROUP_ID, artifactId, version);
103            checkState(file != null && file.exists(), "Could not locate artifact file for %s:%s", artifactId, version);
104            return file;
105        } catch (IOException e) {
106            throw new UncheckedIOException(e);
107        }
108    }
109
110    private InputStream createJarStream(File file) {
111        try {
112            JarFile jar = new JarFile(file);
113            String entryName = format("postgres-%s-%s", computeOS(), computeTarXzArchitectureName());
114
115            // alpine hack
116            if (EmbeddedUtil.IS_ALPINE_LINUX) {
117                entryName += "-alpine_linux";
118            }
119
120            JarEntry jarEntry = jar.getJarEntry(entryName + ".txz");
121            checkState(jarEntry != null, "Could not locate %s in the jar file (%s)", entryName, file.getAbsoluteFile());
122
123            // When the input stream gets closed, close the jar file as well.
124            return new FilterInputStream(jar.getInputStream(jarEntry)) {
125                @Override
126                public void close() throws IOException {
127                    try {
128                        super.close();
129                    } finally {
130                        jar.close();
131                    }
132                }
133            };
134        } catch (IOException e) {
135            throw new UncheckedIOException(e);
136        }
137    }
138
139    @Override
140    public String toString() {
141        return format("ZonkyIO Stream locator for PostgreSQL (arch: %s os: %s, version: %s)", architecture, os, serverVersion);
142    }
143
144    @Override
145    public boolean equals(Object o) {
146        if (this == o) {
147            return true;
148        }
149        if (o == null || getClass() != o.getClass()) {
150            return false;
151        }
152        ZonkyIOPostgresLocator that = (ZonkyIOPostgresLocator) o;
153        return architecture.equals(that.architecture) && os.equals(that.os) && serverVersion.equals(that.serverVersion);
154    }
155
156    @Override
157    public int hashCode() {
158        return Objects.hash(architecture, os, serverVersion);
159    }
160
161    private static String computeTarXzArchitectureName() {
162        String architecture = EmbeddedUtil.OS_ARCH;
163        if (EmbeddedUtil.IS_ARCH_X86_64) {
164            architecture = "x86_64";  // Zonky uses x86_64
165        } else if (EmbeddedUtil.IS_ARCH_AARCH64) {
166            if (!PREFER_NATIVE && EmbeddedUtil.IS_OS_MAC) {
167                // Mac binaries are fat binaries stored as x86_64
168                architecture = "x86_64";
169            } else {
170                architecture = "arm_64";
171            }
172        } else if (EmbeddedUtil.IS_ARCH_AARCH32) {
173            architecture = "arm_32";
174        }
175        return architecture;
176    }
177
178    private static String computeJarArchitectureName() {
179        String architecture = EmbeddedUtil.OS_ARCH;
180        if (EmbeddedUtil.IS_ARCH_X86_64) {
181            architecture = "amd64";  // Zonky uses amd64 for the jar name
182        } else if (EmbeddedUtil.IS_ARCH_AARCH64) {
183            if (!PREFER_NATIVE && EmbeddedUtil.IS_OS_MAC) {
184                // Mac binaries are fat binaries stored as amd64
185                architecture = "amd64";
186            } else {
187                architecture = "arm64v8";
188            }
189        } else if (EmbeddedUtil.IS_ARCH_AARCH32) {
190            architecture = "arm32v7";
191        }
192        return architecture;
193    }
194
195    private static String computeOS() {
196        String os = EmbeddedUtil.OS_NAME;
197        if (EmbeddedUtil.IS_OS_LINUX) {
198            os = "linux";
199        } else if (EmbeddedUtil.IS_OS_MAC) {
200            os = "darwin";
201        } else if (EmbeddedUtil.IS_OS_WINDOWS) {
202            os = "windows";
203        }
204        return os;
205    }
206}
